entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 01:00 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C
Wind: SE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then steady. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
